title: Set alias for columns in data set, but expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
description: When setting an alias for columns in a data set, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the aliases when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the aliases set for the columns should be displayed instead of the old column names.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
